this.tabBar
A reference to the Tabbar, for manipulating the browser’s tab bar.
Singleton for managing the tabbar of the browser.
An Item that represents a tab.
Singleton for managing TabItems
A singleton that manages all of the Mirrors in the system.
Singelton for dealing with the actual tabs in the browser.
A singleton class available in the window namespace that lets you manipulate the TabCandy toolbar button.
triggerPaint: function()
Forces the mirror in question to update its thumbnail.
Singleton top-level UI manager.
unforceCanvasSize: function()
Stops holding the thumbnail resolution; allows it to shift to the size of thumbnail on screen.
unsquish: function(pairs,
ignore)
Checks to see which items can now be unsquished.
updateTabBarForActiveGroup: function()
Hides and shows tabs in the tab bar based on the active group.
this.userSize
A Point that describes the last size specifically chosen by the user.
Singelton with common utility functions.
zoom: function()
Zooms into this tab thereby allowing you to interact with it.
zoomTo: function(tabEl)
Given the containing element of a tab, allows you to select that tab and zoom in on it, thereby bringing you to the tab in Firefox to interact with.
